title: 4th Bali Democracy Forum: President Rajapaksa holds bilateral talks with Heads of State
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix by: Sudath Silva) President Mahinda Rajapaksa who is in Indonesia to address the 4th Bali Democracy Forum held bilateral talks with three other participating Heads of State at Bali Westin Hotel today on 08 December….
